name: MLCConcatenationLayer
desc: A layer that combines tensors into a single tensor.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a concatenation layer with a dimension value of 1, which typically represents feature channels.

items.name: init(dimension: Int)
items.desc: Creates a concatenation layer with the dimension you specify.

items.name: var dimension: Int
items.desc: The dimension, or axis, along which you concatenate tensors.
